trans-unit.source: Displays data in a customizable grid.
trans-unit.target: 可自定义的网格中显示数据。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the accessible client applications when a new cell becomes the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 新的单元格成为当前单元格时，请通知可访问的客户端应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This method converts the specified row and column indexes into `objectID` and `childID` parameters and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%28System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload twice using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将转换到指定的行和列索引`objectID`和`childID`参数和调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%28System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法重载两次使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%28System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>

trans-unit.source: The `objectID` and `childID` are determined by numbering only the visible rows and columns in their display order, counting the row or column headers if they are visible, and starting with 1.
trans-unit.target: `objectID`和`childID`由编号顺序显示，如果它们是可见且从 1 开始计数的行或列的标头的可见的行和列。

trans-unit.source: For example, if column headers are visible, the `objectID` for the first visible nonheader row is 2.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果列标题是否可见，`objectID`对于第一个可见非标头行为 2。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> indicating the row and column indexes of the new current cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，指示新的当前单元格的行和列索引。

trans-unit.source: The value of the property of cellAddress is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1. -or- The value of the property of cellAddress is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 值<> *1> 属性 cellAddress 小于 0 或大于减 1 的控件中的列数。 -的值<> *1> 属性 cellAddress 小于 0 或大于减 1 控件中的行数。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> for a column header cell of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that is currently being painted.
trans-unit.target: 调整<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>的列标题单元格的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>当前正在绘制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control internally calls the AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle method to determine the appearance of the borders for the column header cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件内部调用 AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle 方法来确定的列标题单元格的边框外观。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control typically uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件通常使用的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性`dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput`参数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that that represents the column header border style to modify.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> ，表示列标题边框样式来修改。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that is used to store intermediate changes to the column header border style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>用于存储中间更改到列标题边框样式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is currently being painted is in the first column displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> ，它是当前正在绘制处于上显示的第一个列<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is currently being painted is in the last column in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> ，它是当前正在绘制的最后一列中是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> ，其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible*>属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style for the current column header.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> ，表示当前的列标题的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style for the upper-left cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取在左上角单元格的边框样式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The upper-left cell is the cell that is shared by the column header row and the row header column.
trans-unit.target: 左上角单元格是由列标题行和行标题列共享的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> gets the value of this property while painting the upper-left cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>绘制左上角单元格时获取此属性的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the border of the upper-left cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>表示中的左上角单元格的边框的样式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取中的单元格的边框样式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the AdvancedCellBorderStyle property to customize the appearance of cells' borders.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AdvancedCellBorderStyle 属性自定义单元格的边框的外观。

trans-unit.source: To change the style of the borders using the built-in styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改使用的内置样式边框的样式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>表示中的单元格的边框样式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the column header cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取列的边框样式标题单元格中<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle property to customize the appearance of column header cells' borders.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle 属性自定义列标题单元格边框的外观。

trans-unit.source: To change the style of the borders using the built-in styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改使用的内置样式边框的样式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>表示的边框样式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>中的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the row header cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取行的边框样式标题单元格<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle property to customize the appearance of row header cells' borders in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle 属性自定义在派生的行标题单元格边框外观<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To change the style of the borders using the built-in styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改使用的内置样式边框的样式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>表示的边框样式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref>中的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the option to add rows is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否向用户显示添加行的选项。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to data, the user is allowed to add rows if both this property and the data source's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>绑定到数据，则允许用户将添加行，如果此属性和数据源的<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the add-row option is displayed to the user; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果向用户显示添加行选项否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to delete rows from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许用户希望删除行<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to data, the user is allowed to delete rows if both this property and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>绑定到数据，则允许用户可以删除行，如果这两个此属性与<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can delete rows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户可以删除行;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the AllowUserToDeleteRowsChanged property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 AllowUserToDeleteRowsChanged 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether manual column repositioning is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用手动对列重新定位。

trans-unit.source: When column repositioning is enabled, users can drag a column header to a new position.
trans-unit.target: 启用对列重新定位后，用户可以将列标头拖动到新位置。

trans-unit.source: Note that frozen and unfrozen columns form two separate groups; users can reposition columns within a group, but cannot move a column from one group to the other.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，冻结和解冻的列组成的两个单独的组;用户可重新定位在组中，列，但不能将列从一个组移到其他。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件不支持双缓冲。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>设置为`true`中派生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件，用户将不会收到可视反馈，或对列重新排序时调整行、 列或标头的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can change the column order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户可以更改列的顺序;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users can resize columns.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以调整列的大小。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to prevent users from manually changing column widths.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性以防止用户手动更改列宽。

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, with display-only columns where data is loaded once and columns are resized at that time.
trans-unit.target: 这非常有用，例如，仅显示列，一次加载数据，并且列在该时间调整大小时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cell style applied to odd-numbered rows of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用于奇数行的默认单元格样式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将显示其使用指示的单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>属性，它继承类型<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>的其他属性中的样式</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>的样式的单元格</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For cells in rows with odd index numbers, the styles specified through the AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle property override the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and are overridden by the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 对于具有奇数索引号的行中的单元格，通过 AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle 属性指定的样式重写通过指定的样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>，并通过指定的样式会重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: 获取此属性时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>如果未访问属性，则将创建具有默认值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: 获取此属性为多个行时，这可能导致性能造成负面影响。

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 只要有可能，使用单个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>设置此属性对于多个行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to apply to the odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>要应用于奇数行。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 当任何一个时，将发生此事件的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>属性设置为新值时，或者当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>属性设置为一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>而至少一个属性值不同于上一个单元格样式对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether all the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> cells are currently selected.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>集合不对于大型选择有效地执行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether all the cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> have been selected before you access the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> collection, check the return value of the AreAllCellsSelected method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否中的所有单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>之前访问的内容已选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>集合，请检查 AreAllCellsSelected 方法的返回值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: However, this method can cause rows to become unshared.
trans-unit.target: 但是，此方法可以使行成为非共享行。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包括的行和列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible*>属性值的<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all cells (or all visible cells) are selected or if there are no cells (or no visible cells); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果选择了所有单元格 （或所有可见的单元格） 或者没有单元格 （或没有可见的单元格）;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether columns are created automatically when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember*> properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否列时是否自动创建<> *1> 或<> *1> 属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Columns are automatically generated when this property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> properties are set or changed.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为时自动生成列`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>设置或更改属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Columns can also be automatically generated when the AutoGenerateColumns property is changed from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 列也可以自动生成从更改 AutoGenerateColumns 属性`false`到`true`。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> changes so there are columns that do not match the columns of the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> value, data in the unmatched columns is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>更改，以使不匹配的前一个列的列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>值，不匹配的列中的数据将被丢弃。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> properties are not set.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>未设置属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When AutoGenerateColumns is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control generates one column for each public property of the objects in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 当 AutoGenerateColumns 设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件数据源中生成对象的每个公共属性的一个列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the bound objects implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface, the control generates one column for each property returned by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果绑定的对象实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>接口，该控件生成一列以返回每个属性进行<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Each column header will contain the value of the property name the column represents.
trans-unit.target: 每个列标题将包含列表示的属性名称的值。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property but set AutoGenerateColumns to `false`, you must add columns manually.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>属性但设置为 AutoGenerateColumns `false`，您必须手动添加列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can bind each added column to the data source by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the name of a property exposed by the bound objects.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置将每个添加的列绑定到数据源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>到由绑定的对象公开的属性的名称的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> in the Windows Forms Designer automatically sets the AutoGenerateColumns property to `false` and generates code to add and bind a column for each property in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>Windows 窗体设计器中自动将 AutoGenerateColumns 属性设置为`false`，生成代码以添加并将绑定数据源中的每个属性的列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The code that is generated at design-time is equivalent to the manually added code shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时生成的代码是等效于以下示例所示手动添加代码。

trans-unit.source: It is not the same as the auto-generation of columns at run-time that occurs when the AutoGenerateColumns property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 不是在 AutoGenerateColumns 属性设置为出现的运行时的列自动生成相同`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the columns should be created automatically; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应自动; 创建列否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 当 AutoGenerateColumnsChanged 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the specified column to fit the contents of all its cells, including the header cell.
trans-unit.target: 调整指定列，以适应其所有单元格，包括标题单元格的内容的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制列调整大小时。

trans-unit.source: The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽度如果列更高版本的内容更改，则该列将不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To resize all columns, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整所有列的都大小，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>属性或列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column to resize.
trans-unit.target: 要调整大小的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndex不在 0 到列数减 1 的有效范围内。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the specified column using the specified size mode.
trans-unit.target: 调整指定列使用指定的大小模式的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制列调整大小时。

trans-unit.source: The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust.

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new widths based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.

trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制调整列大小。

trans-unit.source: If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column widths will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method next.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the specified row to fit the contents of all its cells including the header cell.

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` or `fixedRowsHeight` parameters are `false`, the width of the row headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> next.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified row and using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the width with the expectation that the row and/or column header widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 调整基于内容的标头中指定的行并使用指定的大小模式时，还可以选择计算在行和/或列标题的宽度随后进行调整的假定条件下的宽度更改行标题的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified row have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果您要控制行标题进行大小调整只会到绑定的数据源中指定的行的标头的内容更改用户编辑或更改的结果。

trans-unit.source: The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 行标题的宽度调整一次每个方法调用如果内容的更改要求如果后来更改标头，行行标头将的内容不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的行标头，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许你指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的标头，如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how column widths are determined.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如何确定列宽。

trans-unit.source: This property lets you configure the control so that column widths are automatically adjusted either to fill the control or to fit cell contents.
trans-unit.target: 此属性允许您配置控件，以便以填充整个控件，或以适应单元格内容自动调整列宽。

trans-unit.source: Size adjustments occur in fill mode whenever the width of the control changes.
trans-unit.target: 当发生更改时控件的宽度，则将发生大小调整填充模式中。

trans-unit.source: In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> is enabled, whenever row heights change.
trans-unit.target: 在基于内容的大小调整模式下，大小调整单元格内容更改时，或者会发生，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>一旦启用，每当更改行高。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance.
trans-unit.target: 某些基于内容的大小调整模式，可以限制对当前显示的行大小调整，以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: To change the sizing mode for an individual column, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改为单个列的大小调整模式，设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, indicating that the column inherits its behavior and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A> property value from the control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>，，该值指示列继承其行为并将其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A>从控件的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>

trans-unit.source: Columns in fill mode divide the available control width in proportions indicated by their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 列填充模式中的将由所指示的比例的可用控件宽度划分其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The width available for fill mode is determined by subtracting the widths of all other columns from the width of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 通过减去从控件的客户端区域的宽度的所有其他列的宽度确定可用于填充模式的宽度。

trans-unit.source: If this width is smaller than the combined <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A> values of all fill-mode columns, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed, all fill-mode columns are shown with their minimum widths, and user column-resizing is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此宽度小于组合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>所有填充模式列的值，显示水平滚动条，所有填充模式列在都显示时带有最小宽度，并且用户列调整大小时被禁用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关列填充模式的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列填充模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Only columns with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur.
trans-unit.target: 只有具有列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>属性值`true`自动调整大小和更改的列可见性不会导致调整大小时发生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 此外，在列设置为自动调整大小，则用户不能调整鼠标列宽度。

trans-unit.source: To adjust column widths programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> methods or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式调整列宽，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法或设置列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关基于内容的自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性不是有效指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref>, column headers are hidden, and at least one visible column has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref>. -or- The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> and at least one visible column with an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> is frozen.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性指定的值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"> </xref>、 列标题被隐藏，并且至少一个可见列具有<> *1> 属性值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref>。 -当设置此属性时指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref>和具有至少一个可见列<> *1> 属性值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref>被冻结。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode*>

trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how row heights are determined.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如何确定行高。

trans-unit.source: This property lets you configure the control so that row heights are automatically adjusted to fit their contents whenever the contents change.
trans-unit.target: 此属性，允许您配置控件，使行高度自动调整以适应其内容的内容更改时。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> is enabled, row heights are also adjusted whenever column widths change.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>是启用，行高也会进行调整列宽更改时。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance.
trans-unit.target: 某些大小调整模式，可以限制对当前显示的行大小调整，以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: Only rows with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible%2A> property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a row does not cause resizing to occur.
trans-unit.target: 仅使用行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible%2A>属性值`true`自动调整大小和更改行的可见性不会导致调整大小时发生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when rows are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the row heights with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 此外，在行设置为自动调整大小，则用户不能调整行高使用鼠标。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A> value of an automatically sized row is recalculated during layout to account for the size of the font that is used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>自动调整大小的行的值重新计算期间布局以使用的字体的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the correct <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>, you should retrieve the value in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event instead of in the form's constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取正确<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>，应检索窗体的中值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>而不是在窗体的构造函数中的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: To adjust row heights programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> methods, or set the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式调整行高，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法，或者设置行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: 对于调整行的换行为多行的单元格内容，必须<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>属性值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>的单元格样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关基于内容的自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> value indicating the background image layout.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref>值，该值指示的背景图像布局。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.source: Although this event occurs as described, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: 尽管此事件都会发生如下所述，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>属性对于此控件无关。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Puts the current cell in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 将当前的单元格置于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` if the cell fails to enter edit mode, which can happen for a number of reasons.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`false`该单元格无法进入编辑模式，可能会导致大量的原因。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` if the current cell is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`false`如果当前单元格是只读的。

trans-unit.source: It also returns `false` if the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A> property is `null` (meaning the cell cannot host an editing control) and the cell type does not implement the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它还返回`false`如果单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A>属性是`null`（即单元格不能承载编辑控件） 和单元格类型未实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell>接口。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the cell supports editing, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit> event, which can be canceled, and returns `false` if an event handler cancels the edit.
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格支持编辑，此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit>事件，可以取消，并返回`false`如果事件处理程序取消编辑</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit>

trans-unit.source: If the edit is not canceled and the cell can host an editing control, this method initializes the control and displays it.
trans-unit.target: 如果不取消编辑单元格可以承载的编辑控件，此方法会初始化该控件，并显示它。

trans-unit.source: If the initialization fails, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果初始化失败，此方法返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the cell successfully enters edit mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格成功进入编辑模式，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A>属性返回`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select all the cell's contents; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to not select any contents.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>选择单元格的所有内容;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>不选择任何内容。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell is already in edit mode or successfully enters edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前单元格已经处于编辑模式或者成功进入编辑模式;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*> is not set to a valid cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*>未设置为有效的单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*>

trans-unit.source: -or- This method was called in a handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: -或-的处理程序中调用此方法<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The type indicated by the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property does not derive from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> type. -or- The type indicated by the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property does not implement the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 类型由该单元格的指示<> *1> 属性不是派生自<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>类型。 -指示该单元格的类型的<> *1> 属性不实现<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>接口。

trans-unit.source: Initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 编辑单元格值的初始化失败，且没有处理程序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件，或者处理程序已设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 异常对象通常可以转换为类型<xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的边框样式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property affects the outer border of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性如何影响<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>外部边框

trans-unit.source: To set the style of the cell borders, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的单元格边框样式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性不是有效指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyle*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyle*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Cancels edit mode for the currently selected cell and discards any changes.
trans-unit.target: 取消当前选定的单元格的编辑模式，并放弃所有更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cancel was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成功，则取消否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the cancels edits in a row.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>属性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和行中的取消编辑。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in virtual mode, changes are committed to the data cache at the cell level by default.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是在虚拟模式下，更改会提交到数据缓存在单元格级别默认情况下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The CancelRowEdit event can be used when implementing row-level transactions.
trans-unit.target: 实现行级事务时，可以使用 CancelRowEdit 事件。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>属性可以设置为活动值的值，，以启用 IME 支持。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell border style for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取单元格边框样式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the CellBorderStyle property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CellBorderStyle 属性设置为任何非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>属性必须为系统颜色。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the cell border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 无法将此属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>值，该值只读的值，指示使用自定义单元格边框样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the cells contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"> </xref>表示中包含的单元格的边框样式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性不是有效指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性指定的值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the border style of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的边框样式更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any part of a cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的任何部分被单击时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any part of a cell is clicked, including borders and padding.
trans-unit.target: 单击单元格的任何部分，包括边框和填充时，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACE key while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell is clicked while pressing the SPACE key.
trans-unit.target: 它也会发生当用户按下并释放空间键时的按钮单元格或复选框单元格具有焦点，并且如果按 SPACE 键的同时单击单元格都出现两次针对这些单元格类型。

trans-unit.source: To determine when the cell contents are clicked, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定在单击单元格内容时，处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>

trans-unit.source: This event does not receive information about the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不接收有关鼠标位置的信息。

trans-unit.source: If the event handler needs information about the mouse position, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件处理程序需要有关鼠标位置的信息，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick>

trans-unit.source: For clicks in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>, this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event instead.
trans-unit.target: 在单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>，复选框更改值，因此如果你不想要计算的当前值所基于的预期值之前，会发生此事件，通常将处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件相反。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 因为该事件发生的用户指定值时才提交，这通常发生时焦点离开单元格，你还必须处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: 在该处理程序，如果当前单元格复选框单元格，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content within a cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击单元格中的内容时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the cell content is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击单元格内容时，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACEBAR while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell content is clicked while pressing the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: 它还当用户按下并释放时按钮单元格空格键或复选框单元格具有焦点，并且如果按空格键时，在单击单元格内容将发生这些单元格类型的两次时发生。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to detect button clicks for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> or link clicks for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件来检测按钮单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>或链接单击一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: For clicks in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>, this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event instead.
trans-unit.target: 在单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>，复选框更改值，因此如果你不想要计算的当前值所基于的预期值之前，会发生此事件，通常将处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件相反。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 因为该事件发生的用户指定值时才提交，这通常发生时焦点离开单元格，你还必须处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: 在该处理程序，如果当前单元格复选框单元格，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's shortcut menu is needed.
trans-unit.target: 在需要单元格的快捷菜单时发生。

trans-unit.source: The CellContextMenuStripNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: CellContextMenuStripNeeded 事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellContextMenuStripNeeded event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: 在处理 CellContextMenuStripNeeded 事件时，显示指定处理程序中的快捷菜单每当用户右键单击单元格。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要显示当前状态或单元格的值来确定的快捷菜单，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The CellContextMenuStripNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: 每当也会发生 CellContextMenuStripNeeded 事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性检索时，或者以编程方式或当用户右键单击单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>属性来确定的状态或值的一个单元格，并使用此信息来更改或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用单元格的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性，该事件值重写属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the CellContextMenuStripNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 处理 CellContextMenuStripNeeded 事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置单元格的性能损失时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>多个单元格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以指定快捷菜单，为各个行而不是通过设置行的各个单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性或处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the CellContextMenuStripNeeded event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性设置重写行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性设置和 CellContextMenuStripNeeded 事件重写同时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件和行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以指定`null`为单元格的快捷菜单，以防止行的快捷菜单重写。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.target: 当用户双击单元格中的任何位置时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when edit mode stops for the currently selected cell.
trans-unit.target: 发生的编辑模式停止当前选定的单元格。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current cell changes in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control or when the control receives input focus.
trans-unit.target: 在更改当前单元格时发生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件或时在控件接收输入的焦点。

trans-unit.source: This event may occur twice for a single click if the control does not have input focus and the clicked cell was not previously the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件不具有输入的焦点并且单击的单元格以前不是当前单元格，为一次单击两次可能发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText*> property of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText*>更改了单元格的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。
