trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's error text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要单元格的错误文本时发生。

trans-unit.source: The CellErrorTextNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: CellErrorTextNeeded 事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Handling the CellErrorTextNeeded event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state.
trans-unit.target: 你想要确定具体取决于其值或状态的单元格的错误时，处理 CellErrorTextNeeded 事件非常有用。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellErrorTextNeeded event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A> property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 在单元格中显示错误标志符号处理 CellErrorTextNeeded 事件处理程序中指定错误文本时，除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A>属性设置为`false`或单元格处于编辑模式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 当用户移动鼠标指针放在错误图标上方时，错误文本将显示在工具提示中。

trans-unit.source: The CellErrorTextNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 每当也会发生 CellErrorTextNeeded 事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>检索属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>属性来确定的状态或值的一个单元格，然后使用此信息来更改或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用单元格的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>属性，该事件值重写属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the CellErrorTextNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 处理 CellErrorTextNeeded 事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置单元格的性能损失时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>多个单元格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of a cell need to be formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的内容需要的显示格式时发生。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will attempt to convert a cell's value into a format suitable for display.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将尝试将单元格的值转换为适用于显示的格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, it will convert a numerical value into a string for display in a text box cell.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它会将一个数字值转换为以在文本框单元中显示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can indicate the formatting convention to use by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by properties such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指示要用于通过设置的格式设置约定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>等返回的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the standard formatting is insufficient, you can customize the formatting by handling the CellFormattingevent.
trans-unit.target: 如果标准的格式设置是不够的则可以自定义通过处理 CellFormattingevent 格式设置。

trans-unit.source: This event lets you indicate the exact display value as well as the cell styles, such as background and foreground color, to use for the cell display.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可以指示的确切显示值，以及单元格样式，如前景色和背景颜色，用于单元格显示。

trans-unit.source: This means you can handle this event for any kind of cell formatting, regardless of whether the cell value itself needs formatting.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着你可以处理任何类型的单元格格式，而不考虑是否单元格的值本身需要进行格式设置此事件。

trans-unit.source: The CellFormatting event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event.
trans-unit.target: 每次每个单元格绘制，因此，应避免耗时处理处理此事件时，CellFormatting 事件时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event also occurs when the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> is retrieved or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 也会发生此事件时该单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>检索或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellFormatting event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is initialized with the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 在处理 CellFormatting 事件时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>与单元格的值初始化属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你提供从单元格的值的显示值的自定义转换，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>转换后的值，以确保新值所指定单元格的类型属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示没有进一步设置值的格式设置必要，请设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is formatted using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序完成后，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>是`null`或者不是正确的类型，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>格式都是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>属性返回的单元格样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，使用该单元格初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the display properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are used to render the cell.
trans-unit.target: 无论的值如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，返回的对象的显示属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性用于呈现该单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom formatting using the CellFormatting event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用 CellFormatting 事件自定义格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中自定义数据格式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免处理此事件时出现的性能损失，请通过事件处理程序，而不是直接访问该单元格的参数访问单元格。

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义格式化、 用户指定的值转换为实际的单元值，处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell loses input focus and is no longer the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 单元格失去输入的焦点并且不再对当前单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the user clicks anywhere on a cell with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 每当用户单击的任何位置包含鼠标的单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user clicks using any of the mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击使用任何鼠标按钮时，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性来确定被单击的按钮。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To detect clicks on the contents of a cell, such as a button or link within a cell, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要检测单击单元格，如按钮或链接在单元格中，内容使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>

trans-unit.source: The handler for this event receives the column index and row index of the mouse pointer position.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的处理程序接收的列索引和鼠标指针位置的行索引。

trans-unit.source: For clicks in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>, this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event instead.
trans-unit.target: 在单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>，复选框更改值，因此如果你不想要计算的当前值所基于的预期值之前，会发生此事件，通常将处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>事件相反。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 因为该事件发生的用户指定值时才提交，这通常发生时焦点离开单元格，你还必须处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged>

trans-unit.source: In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: 在该处理程序，如果当前单元格复选框单元格，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>方法并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针移动时发生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.target: 当用户释放鼠标按钮停留在单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user releases any of the mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: 当用户释放任何鼠标按钮时，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性来确定被单击的按钮。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 当需要绘制单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to customize the appearance of cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理此事件以自定义控件中的单元格的外观。

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire cells yourself, or paint specific parts of cells and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to paint other parts.
trans-unit.target: 你可以绘制整个单元格自行，或绘制的单元格的特定部分，并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来绘制其他部分。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>类来绘制使用当前主题的标准控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，你可以访问你可以使用的标准映像的大型库<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When handling this event, you should access the cell through the parameters of the event handler, rather than access the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: 处理此事件时，你应通过的参数的事件处理程序中，访问该单元格，而不是直接访问该单元格。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell leaves edit mode if the cell value has been modified.
trans-unit.target: 单元格退出编辑模式，如果单元格值已修改时发生。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will attempt to convert a user-specified value displayed in a cell to an actual underlying cell value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将尝试将转换为实际的基础的单元格值指定单元格的类型中的单元格中显示的一个用户指定值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This conversion uses the formatting properties of the cell style returned by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 这种转换使用返回的单元格的单元格样式的格式设置属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the standard conversion does not meet your needs, handle the CellParsing event to provide custom value conversion to the required type.
trans-unit.target: 如果标准转换不满足你的需求，处理 CellParsing 事件，以便提供自定义值转换为所需的类型。

trans-unit.source: Users can enter edit mode using the method specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A> property, and can leave edit mode, committing any changes to a cell, by moving to another cell or by pressing ENTER.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以进入编辑模式，使用指定的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>属性，并可以退出编辑模式，在单元格中，提交更改，将移动到另一个单元格，或通过按 enter 键。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pressing ESC will revert any changes to the value before it is committed, and the CellParsing event will not occur.
trans-unit.target: 未提交，且不会发生 CellParsing 事件之前，则按 esc 键将恢复任何更改的值。

trans-unit.source: The CellParsing event occurs only if the cell value has actually been modified, even if the final value is the same as the original value.
trans-unit.target: 仅当单元格的值实际上已被修改，即使的最终值是与原始值相同，会发生 CellParsing 事件。

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 它也会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellParsing event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion.
trans-unit.target: 在处理 CellParsing 事件时，可以自行转换该值，或者可以自定义默认转换。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with type converters of your choosing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以将值转换使用单元格自行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>方法与你选择的类型转换器。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以让默认类型转换器分析值，但需要修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>返回的对象的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，使用该单元格初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当你自行转换该值时，替换初始的格式化值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性中指定单元格的类型的转换值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示，没有任何进一步分析是必要的设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is parsed using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with default type converters.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序完成后，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>是`null`或者不是正确的类型，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>分析使用的单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>与默认类型转换器方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method parses the value using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style passed in.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的默认实现分析值使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>传递单元的单元格样式属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, the value is parsed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property and the type converters passed in.
trans-unit.target: 如果值不等于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>、 值分析使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>属性和传递单元类型转换器</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义显示的格式值的一个单元格值的转换，处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell state changes, such as when the cell loses or gains focus.
trans-unit.target: 当单元格状态更改，例如当单元格失去或获得焦点时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*> property of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*>属性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a new value or when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 当任何一个时，将发生此事件的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为新值时，或者当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>而至少一个属性值不同于上一个单元格样式对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the values of a cell style changes.
trans-unit.target: 当一个单元格样式的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The CellStyleContentChanged event occurs when a property value of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by one of the following properties changes: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> If one of these properties is set to a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>, however, the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event occurs, but the CellStyleContentChanged event does not occur.
trans-unit.target: CellStyleContentChanged 事件发生时的一个属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>对象由以下属性更改之一:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>如果其中一个属性设置为另一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>，但相应*PropertyName* `Changed`事件发生，但未发生 CellStyleContentChanged 事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For row, column, and cell properties, the name of the *PropertyName*`Changed` event begins with "`Row`", "`Column`", or "`Cell`" (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>).
trans-unit.target: 有关行、 列和单元属性的名称*PropertyName* `Changed`事件开头"`Row`"，"`Column`"，或"`Cell`"(例如， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>

trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText*>中的单元格的属性值更改<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's ToolTip text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要单元格的工具提示文本时发生。

trans-unit.source: The CellToolTipTextNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: CellToolTipTextNeeded 事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellToolTipTextNeeded event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在处理 CellToolTipTextNeeded 事件时，显示处理程序中指定的工具提示文本每当鼠标指针位于单元格和控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>属性值是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CellToolTipTextNeeded event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要显示工具提示当前状态或单元格的值来确定，此 CellToolTipTextNeeded 事件非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The CellToolTipTextNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell.
trans-unit.target: 每当也会发生 CellToolTipTextNeeded 事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性检索时，或者以编程方式或在鼠标指针进入单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>属性来确定的状态或值的一个单元格，并使用此信息来更改或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用单元格的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>属性，该事件值重写属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the CellToolTipTextNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 处理 CellToolTipTextNeeded 事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置单元格的性能损失时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>多个单元格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the cell has finished validating.
trans-unit.target: 单元格完成验证之后发生。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is useful for post-validation processing of the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 处理此事件可用于验证后处理的单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell loses input focus, enabling content validation.
trans-unit.target: 当在单元格失去输入的焦点，启用内容验证时发生。

trans-unit.source: Canceling this event cancels the changes to the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 取消此事件取消对当前单元格的更改。

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果此事件已取消在数据绑定模式下，新值不是推送到基础数据源。

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: 在虚拟模式下，取消此事件时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>不会引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated> event to perform post-validation processing.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated>事件来执行验证之后处理。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The CellValueChanged event occurs when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell.
trans-unit.target: CellValueChanged 事件发生时的用户指定的值也会提交，这通常发生在焦点离开单元格时。

trans-unit.source: In the case of check box cells, however, you will typically want to handle the change immediately.
trans-unit.target: 对于复选框单元格，但是，你将通常想要立即处理更改。

trans-unit.source: To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要在单击单元格时，请提交更改，你必须处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: 在处理程序中，如果当前单元格，复选框单元格调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when a cell value is changed.
trans-unit.target: 当更改一个单元格值，控件中的行不会自动进行排序。

trans-unit.source: To sort the control when the user modifies a cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method in a CellValueChanged event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要在用户修改某个单元格时，排序控件，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>CellValueChanged 事件处理程序中的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> requires a value for a cell in order to format and display the cell.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>属性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>需要才格式化和显示的单元格的单元格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: Use this event in virtual mode to populate cells with data from a custom data store without causing rows to become unshared.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件中的虚拟模式而不会导致要成为非共享行的行填充具有自定义数据存储区中的数据的单元格。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的虚拟模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To add user-specified values to your custom data store, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将用户指定值添加到自定义数据存储区中，处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and a cell value has changed and requires storage in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>属性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和一个单元格值已更改并需要存储在基础数据源。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: Use this event in virtual mode to update a custom data store with user-specified data.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件中的虚拟模式来使用用户指定的数据更新的自定义数据存储区。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event to retrieve values from the data store for display in the control.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>事件，以从控件中显示的数据存储中检索值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的虚拟模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Clears the current selection by unselecting all selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 通过取消选择所有选定的单元格来清除当前的选择。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, each column and row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当调用此方法，每个列和行的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>

trans-unit.source: Cancels the selection of all currently selected cells except the one indicated, optionally ensuring that the indicated cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取消选择除指示，根据需要确保选中了指示的单元格的所有当前所选单元格。

trans-unit.source: A `rowIndexException` value of -1 represents a column header, and a `columnIndexException` value of -1 represents a row header.
trans-unit.target: A`rowIndexException`值为-1 表示列标题，和一个`columnIndexException`值为-1 表示的行是标题。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to clear the current selection without canceling the selection of the cell, row, or column indicated by the exception indexes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于不取消选择单元格、 行或列由异常索引的情况下清除当前所选内容。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value allows individual cell selection, this method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A> property of each cell to `false`, excluding the cell in the row and column specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性值允许选择单个单元格，此方法会设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A>属性的每个单元格`false`，不包括中的行和指定列的单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value allows full row or column selection, this method also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property of each row or column to `false`, excluding the row or column containing the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性值的允许完整行或列的选择此方法还集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>的每个行或列的属性`false`、 行或列以包含指定的单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The excluded cell, row, or column may or may not be in the selected state when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 排除的单元格、 行或列可能或可能未处于选定状态时调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method selects it if the `selectExceptionElement` parameter value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法如果选择`selectExceptionElement`参数值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the selection mode, the entire row or column may also be selected as a result.
trans-unit.target: 根据选择模式中，在整个行或列也可能被选择结果。

trans-unit.source: The column index to exclude.
trans-unit.target: 要排除的列索引。

trans-unit.source: The row index to exclude.
trans-unit.target: 要排除的行索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select the excluded cell, row, or column; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to retain its original state.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要选择已排除的单元格、 行或列。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>要保留其原始状态。

trans-unit.source: columnIndexException is greater than the highest column index.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexException大于最高的列索引。

trans-unit.source: -or- columnIndexException is less than -1 when is ; otherwise, columnIndexException is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: -columnIndexException小于-1 时是 ; 否则为columnIndexException小于 0。

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndexException is greater than the highest row index.
trans-unit.target: -或-rowIndexException大于最高行索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can copy cell text values to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref> and whether row and column header text is included.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以将复制到的单元格文本值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>以及是否包括行和列标题文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control copies the text representation of each selected cell to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将每个选定的单元格的文本表示复制到剪贴板。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This value is the cell value converted to a string or, for image cells, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此值是单元格的值转换为字符串，或对于图像单元格的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Values are copied to the Clipboard in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue> formats.
trans-unit.target: 值复制到剪贴板中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue>格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>

trans-unit.source: These formats are useful for pasting content into applications such as Notepad, [!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/add/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/add/includes/ofprword-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 这些格式可用于将内容粘贴到应用程序 （如记事本） [!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/add/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/add/includes/ofprword-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control copies the cells contained in the smallest rectangle that includes all selected cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件复制中包括所有选定的单元格的最小矩形包含单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Rows and columns that do not contain any selected cells are not represented in the copied data.
trans-unit.target: 行和列不包含任何选定的单元格不在所复制的数据中表示。

trans-unit.source: Any unselected cells in the remaining rows and columns are represented by blank placeholders.
trans-unit.target: 由空白占位符表示剩余行和列中的所有未选定单元格。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the copy mode and the selection mode, header values for the copied rows and columns may be copied, as well.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于复制模式和选择模式中，复制的行和列的标头值可复制，以及。

trans-unit.source: When users copy content, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 当用户复制内容，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>到剪贴板。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This data object is retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此数据对象检索从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call this method when you want to programmatically add the data object to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要以编程方式将数据对象添加到剪贴板时，你可以调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>method retrieves values for individual cells by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>方法通过调用检索各个单元格的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override either or both of these methods in derived classes to customize the layout of copied cells or to support additional data formats.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写这两种方法在派生类中自定义的复制的单元格的布局，或以支持其他数据格式或其中任何一个。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Clipboard operations and data formats, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关剪贴板操作和数据格式的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks a divider between two columns.
trans-unit.target: 当用户双击两个列之间的分隔符时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a column divider.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于自定义当用户双击列分隔符时发生的自动调整大小行为。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can handle this event to programmatically resize columns based only on the content in the rows that are currently visible, avoiding a performance impact with the default behavior when working with a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以处理此事件，若要以编程方式调整大小仅根据当前可见的行中的内容的列使用大量的行时避免对性能有影响的默认行为。

trans-unit.source: The column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click.
trans-unit.target: 列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>属性不会扩展用户可在其中双击的区域。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the width of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column.
trans-unit.target: 如果已通过使用此属性增加了分隔符的宽度，则当用户双击分隔线和相邻的列之间的边界发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: If the ColumnHeadersBorderStyle property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ColumnHeadersBorderStyle 属性设置为任何非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>属性必须为系统颜色。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 无法将此属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>值，该值只读的值，指示使用自定义边框样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> property is `true`, the column headers are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果通过应用程序启用了可视样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>属性是`true`，使用当前主题绘制列标题。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value of the ColumnHeadersBorderStyle property is ignored for all column headers except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, to which the theme is not applied.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，ColumnHeadersBorderStyle 属性的值对于除以外的所有列标题，将忽略<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>，到未应用主题。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState?displayProperty=fullName>| These values automatically override the values set through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.

|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性的值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性的值。 | trans-unit.source: To force column headers to inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> values, you must set the values in the ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle object to the default values indicated for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> class.

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> is set to `true`, all header cells except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A> are painted using the current theme and the ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle values are ignored.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height of the column headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>, the height of the column headers cannot be adjusted by the user.

trans-unit.source: To adjust the height of the column headers programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> method or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: 对于调整列标题中的大小换行为多行的单元格内容，必须<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>属性值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>的单元格样式。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the value of one of the following column properties changes for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> in the control: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Displayed%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Commits changes in the current cell to the data cache without ending edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 提交到数据缓存的当前单元格中的更改，但不结束编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to convert the formatted, user-specified value to the underlying cell data type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法尝试将用户指定的格式化值转换为基础的单元格数据类型。

trans-unit.source: To do this, it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event, which you can handle to customize the type conversion.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，它会发出<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件，你可以处理自定义类型转换。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, default type converters are used.
trans-unit.target: 否则，将使用默认类型转换器。

trans-unit.source: Conversion errors may result in an exception if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event is not handled to prevent it.
trans-unit.target: 转换错误可能会导致异常，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>不处理事件以防止它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>

trans-unit.source: If the value is successfully converted, it is committed to the data store, raising the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event for non-data-bound cells when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功转换值，它将提交到数据存储，引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件未绑定数据的单元格时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性值是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: If the value is successfully committed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值已成功提交，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>事件发生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref> values that specifies the context in which an error can occur.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref>指定可能出错的上下文的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the changes were committed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果更改已提交的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The cell value could not be committed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 无法提交单元格值，且没有处理程序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件，或者处理程序已设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的可访问对象的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An empty <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection"></xref>.
