trans-unit.target: 创建并返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>它可以强制转换为类型<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>新

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> property to initialize its value.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>属性来初始化其值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 一个空<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An empty <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the currently active cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前处于活动状态的单元格。

trans-unit.source: When you set a cell as the current cell, it will scroll into view if it is not currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: 作为当前单元格设置单元格时，它将滚动到视图中，如果当前未显示。

trans-unit.source: The current cell cannot be a header cell, a disabled cell, or a cell in a hidden row or column.
trans-unit.target: 当前单元格不能为隐藏的行或列中的标题单元格、 已禁用的单元格或单元格。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to `null` to temporarily remove the focus rectangle, but when the control receives focus and the value of this property is `null`, it is automatically set to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FirstDisplayedCell%2A>property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将此属性设置为`null`临时删除聚焦框，但当在控件接收焦点，并且此属性的值位于`null`，它自动设置的值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FirstDisplayedCell%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FirstDisplayedCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you change the value of this property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 当您更改此属性的值时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>事件之前发生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event handler accessing the CurrentCell property at this time will get its previous value.
trans-unit.target: 任何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>此时访问 CurrentCell 属性的事件处理程序将获取其以前的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: When you bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to an external data source, this property is reset to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>到外部数据源时，此属性将重置为其默认值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that represents the current cell, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no current cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> ，表示当前单元格，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有当前单元格。

trans-unit.source: The default is the first cell in the first column or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there are no cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是第一列中的第一个单元格或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果控件中没有单元格。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property cannot be set because changes to the current cell cannot be committed or canceled.
trans-unit.target: 无法设置此属性的值，因为不能提交或取消对当前单元格的更改。

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified cell when setting this property is in a hidden row or column.
trans-unit.target: -或者-当设置此属性时隐藏的行或列中指定的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Re-entrant calling is only allowed when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is bound to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>.
trans-unit.target: 可重入调用时，才允许<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>绑定到一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Re-entrant calling results from a change to the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: 可重入调用进行更改将导致对基础数据。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell when setting this property is not in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时指定的单元格不在<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row and column indexes of the currently active cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前处于活动状态的单元格的行和列索引。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the row and column of the current cell without accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于确定无需直接访问该单元格的行和当前的单元格的列。

trans-unit.source: This is useful to avoid unsharing shared rows.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于避免取消共享的行。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the row and column indexes of the currently active cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，它表示当前处于活动状态的单元格的行和列索引。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the state of a cell changes in relation to a change in its contents.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的状态更改而在其内容更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: A cell is marked as modified if its contents have changed but the change has not been saved.
trans-unit.target: 单元格被标记为已修改如果其内容已更改，但不是保存更改。

trans-unit.source: This event typically occurs when a cell has been edited but the change has not been committed to the data cache, or when an edit operation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 当编辑单元格，但更改尚未提交到数据缓存中，或者编辑操作被取消时，通常会发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row containing the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含当前单元格的行。

trans-unit.source: To change the current row, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property to a cell in the desired row.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改当前行，必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>属性设置为所需的行的单元格中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that represents the row containing the current cell, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no current cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>表示包含当前的单元格的行或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有当前单元格。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a data-binding operation has finished.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定操作完成之后发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the contents of the data source change or when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 或数据的内容源更改时，将引发此事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is useful, for example, to programmatically resize rows and columns based on content updates.
trans-unit.target: 处理此事件很有用，例如，若要以编程方式调整大小的行和列基于内容的更新。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an external data-parsing or validation operation throws an exception, or when an attempt to commit data to a data source fails.
trans-unit.target: 当外部数据分析或验证操作引发异常，或当试图提交到数据源的数据将会失败时发生。

trans-unit.source: The DataError event enables you to handle exceptions thrown in code that is called by the control during data processing operations.
trans-unit.target: DataError 事件使你能够处理由该控件调用数据处理操作期间的代码中引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs> object associated with this event normally indicate the cell in which the data error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs>通常与此事件关联的对象指示发生数据错误该单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the error occurs in an external data source, however, the data source may not provide the column in which the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 外部数据源错误时，但是，数据源可能无法提供发生错误的列。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property typically indicates the column of the current cell at the time of the error.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>属性通常在出错时指示当前单元格的列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the list or table in the data source for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is displaying data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据源中的列表或表的名称，其中<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>所显示数据。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when binding to a data source that contains multiple lists or tables.
trans-unit.target: 在绑定到包含多个列表或表的数据源时，此属性很有用。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to set this property when binding to a data source that contains a single list or table.
trans-unit.target: 不需要设置此属性，当绑定到数据源包含单个列表或表。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can bind a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains a single table without setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以将绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制转移到<xref:System.Data.DataSet>而无需设置此属性包含单个表。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains multiple tables, however, you must set this property to the name of one of the tables.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.DataSet>包含多个表，但是，你必须将此属性设置为其中一个表的名称。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: The name of the table or list in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is displaying data.
trans-unit.target: 表或列表中的名称<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>为其<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>所显示数据。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String.Empty>。</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred in the data source and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在数据源中出现错误，这是由于没有处理程序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件，或者处理程序已设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 异常对象通常可以转换为类型<xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is displaying data for.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>所显示数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class supports the standard Windows Forms data-binding model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>类支持标准 Windows 窗体数据绑定模型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This means the data source can be of any type that implements one of the following interfaces: - The <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface, including one-dimensional arrays.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着数据源可以是任何类型的实现以下接口之一:-<xref:System.Collections.IList>接口，包括一维数组。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface, such as the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and <xref:System.Data.DataSet> classes.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>接口，如<xref:System.Data.DataTable>和<xref:System.Data.DataSet>类。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface, such as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601> class.
trans-unit.target: 的<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>接口，如<xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601>类。</xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> interface, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 的<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>接口，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: For specific examples, see the Example section and the task table at the end of this section.
trans-unit.target: 有关具体示例，请参阅示例部分和在本部分末尾的任务表。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you will bind to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component and bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component to another data source or populate it with business objects.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，将绑定到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>组件和绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>组件与另一个数据源，或者使用业务对象填充它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component is the preferred data source because it can bind to a wide variety of data sources and can resolve many data binding issues automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>组件是首选的数据源，因为它可以将绑定到各种数据源，并可以自动解决许多数据绑定问题。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: When binding to a data source that contains multiple lists or tables, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> property to a string that specifies the list or table to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定到数据源包含多个列表或表时，必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>属性设置为一个字符串，指定要绑定到表的列表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: When binding to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component that contains multiple lists or tables, however, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component instead.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>包含多个列表或表，不过的组件，你可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>组件相反。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an object collection rather than to database data, you will typically set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property to `null` rather than using the default value of <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>, which is appropriate for database data.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定到的对象集合，而不数据库数据时，通常将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性`null`而不是使用的默认值<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>，这是适用于数据库数据。</xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Displaying Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中显示数据](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to display.
trans-unit.target: 包含数据的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>以显示。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred in the data source and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在数据源中出现错误，这是由于没有处理程序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件，或者处理程序已设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 异常对象通常可以转换为类型<xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cell style to be applied to the cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> if no other cell style properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用到中的单元格的默认单元格样式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>如果未不设置任何其他单元格样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将显示其使用指示的单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>属性，它继承类型<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>的其他属性中的样式</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>的样式的单元格</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The styles specified through the DefaultCellStyle property affect all cells except when overridden by the styles specified through the following properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 通过 DefaultCellStyle 属性指定的样式会影响除时重写通过以下属性指定的样式的所有单元格:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: 获取此属性时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>如果未访问属性，则将创建具有默认值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: 获取此属性为多个行时，这可能导致性能造成负面影响。

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 只要有可能，使用单个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>设置此属性对于多个行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>作为默认样式应用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property are set to new values or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 当任何一个时，将发生此事件的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性设置为新值时，或者当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性设置为一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>而至少一个属性值不同于上一个单元格样式对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default initial size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认初始大小。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the initial size of the control, which is 240 pixels wide by 150 pixels high.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>表示该控件，即 240 像素宽乘 150 像素高的初始大小。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user enters the row for new records so that it can be populated with default values.
trans-unit.target: 当用户输入新记录行，以便它可以使用默认值填充时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event lets you populate the row for new records when the user enters the row.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可让你填充用于新纪录的行，当用户输入行。

trans-unit.source: Initial values for the row come from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> returned by each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始行值来自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>每个列返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: In data bound mode, all cell values for data bound columns are stored in the external data source.
trans-unit.target: 在数据绑定模式下，所有单元格绑定的列都存储在外部数据源中的数据的值。

trans-unit.source: When the user enters the row for new records, a new row is created in the data source before the DefaultValuesNeeded event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 当用户输入新记录行时，DefaultValuesNeeded 事件发生之前，都在数据源中创建新的一行。

trans-unit.source: When you populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in your event handler, the values are added directly to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 当填充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性在事件处理程序，可以直接到数据源中添加值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, after this event occurs, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event occurs for each cell in the new row so that you can store the default values in your custom data store.
trans-unit.target: 在虚拟模式下，此事件发生后,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>每个单元格在新行中发生的事件，以便你可以在自定义数据存储区中存储的默认值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event occurs for each cell in the new row, retrieving the values that you stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event, which are then displayed.
trans-unit.target: 然后，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>事件发生在新行中，每个单元格检索中存储的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件，然后显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of columns displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 返回向用户显示的列数。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include partial columns in the displayed column count; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包括显示的列数; 中的部分列否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 向用户显示的列数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of rows displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 返回向用户显示的行数。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include partial rows in the displayed row count; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包括显示的行数; 中的部分行否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 向用户显示的行数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示控件的显示区域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The DisplayRectangle property returns the client rectangle of the display area of the control, not including the area occupied by any scroll bars that are showing.
trans-unit.target: DisplayRectangle 属性返回控件，不包括任何显示的滚动条占用的区域的显示区域的客户端的矩形。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，表示控件的显示区域。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and its child controls and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>和及其子控件，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control hosted by the current cell, if a cell with an editing control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含编辑控件的单元格处于编辑模式，请获取当前单元格，承载的控件。

trans-unit.source: If the cell is not in edit mode or the cell type does not accommodate an editing control, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格不处于编辑模式，或单元格类型不适用于编辑控件，此属性返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> hosted by the current cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>当前单元格承载。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control for editing a cell is showing.
trans-unit.target: 显示用于编辑单元格的控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理此事件时要执行的编辑控件的自定义初始化在单元格进入编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义控件的显示特征，设置返回的对象的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To perform other initialization, cast the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the specific control type and access the members directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行其他初始化，将值强制转换的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为特定于控件类型，并直接访问的成员。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can handle the EditingControlShowing event to attach event-handlers to the events of the editing control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以处理 EditingControlShowing 事件将事件处理程序附加到的编辑控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control hosts one editing control at a time, and reuses the editing control whenever the cell type does not change between edits.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制一次承载一个编辑控件和重复使用编辑控件，每当编辑之间不发生更改的单元格类型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When attaching event-handlers to the editing control, you must therefore take precautions to avoid attaching the same handler multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 将事件处理程序附加到编辑控件，因此必须采取预防措施以避免多次附加同一处理程序。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, remove the handler from the event before you attach the handler to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此问题，请移除之前将该处理程序附加到事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This will prevent duplication if the handler is already attached to the event, but will have no effect otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 这将防止重复，如果处理程序已连接到的事件，但将不起任何作用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the example code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的代码示例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>类概述。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the panel that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>的面板

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property, which is `null` when the current cell is not in edit mode, the EditingPanel property is always available.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>属性，它是`null`时对当前单元格不处于编辑模式，EditingPanel 属性是始终可用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Panel"></xref> that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Panel"> </xref>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how to begin editing a cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如何开始编辑单元格。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> values except for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> also allow a user to double-click a cell to begin editing it.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>值除外<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>还允许用户通过双击单元格以开始编辑它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性不是有效指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property would cause the control to enter edit mode, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性指定的值将导致控件进入编辑模式，但是没有处理程序的编辑单元格的值失败，并且初始化<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件，或者处理程序已设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 异常对象通常可以转换为类型<xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row and column headers use the visual styles of the user's current theme if visual styles are enabled for the application.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示行和列标题是否使用用户当前主题的可视样式，是否应用程序启用了可视样式。

trans-unit.source: You can enable visual styles for your application by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用你的应用程序中启用视觉样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If EnableHeadersVisualStyles is set to `true`, all header cells except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A> are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 如果 EnableHeadersVisualStyles 设置为`true`，除之外的所有标头单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>使用当前主题绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if visual styles are enabled for the headers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果对标题; 启用了可视样式否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Commits and ends the edit operation on the current cell using the default error context.
trans-unit.target: 提交并结束编辑操作使用默认错误上下文对当前单元格。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EndEdit%2A> overload, passing in a bitwise combination of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> values.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EndEdit%2A>重载，并传入的按位组合中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EndEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit>

trans-unit.source: This method may result in an exception if errors are not handled with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可能会导致异常，如果错误不会处理与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the edit operation is committed and ended; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果编辑操作已提交并结束;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The cell value could not be committed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 无法提交单元格值，且没有处理程序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件，或者处理程序已设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Commits and ends the edit operation on the current cell using the specified error context.
trans-unit.target: 提交并结束编辑操作使用指定的错误上下文对当前单元格。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit>

trans-unit.source: This method may result in an exception if errors are not handled with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可能会导致异常，如果错误不会处理与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref> values that specifies the context in which an error can occur.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref>指定可能出错的上下文的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the edit operation is committed and ended; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果编辑操作已提交并结束;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The cell value could not be committed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 无法提交单元格值，且没有处理程序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件，或者处理程序已设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first cell currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>; typically, this cell is in the upper left corner.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前显示在第一个单元格<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>; 通常情况下，此单元格位于左上角。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine which cell is in the first row and column currently displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于确定哪个单元格位于第一行中，控件中当前显示的列。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in the upper left corner, but for right-to-left languages, it is in the upper right corner.
trans-unit.target: 通常，这是左上角，但对于从右到左的语言，它是右上角。

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property to scroll the control to the indicated cell.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以设置此属性，以将控件滚动到指示的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> currently displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 第一个<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>当前显示在控件中。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell when setting this property is not in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时指定的单元格不在<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell when setting this property has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> property value of -1, indicating that it is a header cell or a shared cell.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时指定的单元格<> *1> 或<> *1> 为-1，指示它为标题单元格或共享单元格的属性值。

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified cell when setting this property has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -或-当设置此属性时指定的单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible*>属性值<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the portion of the column that is currently scrolled out of view..
trans-unit.target: 获取当前滚动到视图的列的部分的宽度。.

trans-unit.source: The width of the portion of the column that is scrolled out of view.
trans-unit.target: 滚动到视图的列的部分的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the column that is the first column displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的索引，该列是显示在第一列<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column that is the first column displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 该列是显示在第一列的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性指定的值是小于 0 或大于减 1 的控件中的列数。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property indicates a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>. -or- The specified value when setting this property indicates a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性指示的列指定的值<> *1> 属性值<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。 -当设置此属性指示的列指定的值<> *1> 属性值<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the row that is the first row displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为上显示的第一行的行的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Scroll> event.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Scroll>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Scroll>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that is the first row displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 为上显示的第一行的行索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性指定的值是小于 0 或大于减 1 控件中的行数。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property indicates a row with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>. -or- The specified value when setting this property indicates a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Frozen*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性指示某一行而该行指定的值<> *1> 属性值<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。 -当设置此属性指示的列指定的值<> *1> 属性值<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示的文本的字体<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>属性是一个环境属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>都不具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>作为其父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>默认情况下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>类或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类概述。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Drawing.Font>不可变 （这意味着你无法调整其任何属性），您可以只分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>属性指定新<xref:System.Drawing.Font>对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: However, you can base the new font on the existing font.
trans-unit.target: 但是，您可以基于新的字体基于现有的字体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses the value of the Font property as the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objects returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件使用的字体属性的值的默认值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Changing the Font value automatically updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> properties, changing the font for any cell that inherits the value.
trans-unit.target: 更改字体值会自动更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>属性，更改继承值的任何单元格的字体。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Header cells override the value by default, and you can override the value for specific rows, columns, and cells.
trans-unit.target: 标头单元格默认情况下，将重写值，并且你可以重写特定行、 列和单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关单元格样式继承的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>要应用于由控件显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font*>属性值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font*>

trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Drawing.Font>不可变 （这意味着你无法调整其任何属性），您可以只分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>属性指定新<xref:System.Drawing.Font>对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: However, you can base the new font on the existing font.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref> that identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> to retrieve.

trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of cells that satisfy the provided filter.
trans-unit.target: 获取满足所提供的筛选器的单元格的数目。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to determine the number of cells in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于确定在某一特定状态的单元格的数目。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the number of selected cells, for example, use this method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索选定的单元格的数目，例如，使用此方法与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is typically more efficient than using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 这是通常比使用效率更高<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values specifying the cells to count.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref>指定要计数的单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The number of cells that match the includeFilter parameter.
trans-unit.target: 匹配的单元格的数目 includeFilter 参数。

trans-unit.source: includeFilter includes the value .
trans-unit.target: includeFilter包含值 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the rectangle that represents the display area for a cell.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示单元格的显示区域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the entire cell bounds or the displayed portion only.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回整个单元格界限或仅显示的部分。

trans-unit.source: To get the bounds of the cell contents only, use the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取该单元格的边界内容、 只可使用该单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The column index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: 所需单元格的列索引。

trans-unit.source: The row index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: 所需单元格的行索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to return the displayed portion of the cell only; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to return the entire cell bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要返回的单元格; 仅显示的部分<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>返回整个单元格界限。

trans-unit.target: -或-rowIndex小于-1 或大于减 1 控件中的行数。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted values that represent the contents of the selected cells for copying to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 检索表示用于将复制到所选的单元格的内容的格式化的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves data that represents the region defined by the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检索表示选定单元格定义的区域的数据。

trans-unit.source: This region is the smallest rectangle that includes all of the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 此区域是最小的矩形包含所有选定的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The value for each selected cell in this region is retrieved by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 在此区域中每个选定单元格的值通过调用检索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Blank placeholder values are used for unselected cells in this region.
trans-unit.target: 对于未选定的单元格，在此区域将使用空白的占位符值。

trans-unit.source: This method combines these values into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> containing several formats for copying to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将合并到这些值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>包含几种格式复制到剪贴板。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>

trans-unit.source: The supported clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 支持的剪贴板格式包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataObject"></xref> that represents the contents of the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataObject"> </xref>表示选定单元格的内容。

trans-unit.target: 返回表示由列索引的列的显示区域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the grid lines separating the cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置网格线的单元格进行分隔的颜色<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You can set the GridColor property to any color when you use a single border; with other types of borders, the colors are specified by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 使用一个边框; 时，可以为任何颜色设置 GridColor 属性与其他类型的边框，指定由操作系统的颜色。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, the GridColor property is ignored, and the current theme's colors are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过应用程序启用了可视样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，将忽略此 GridColor 属性，并使用当前主题的颜色。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> or <xref href="System.Drawing.SystemColors"></xref> that represents the color of the grid lines.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Drawing.SystemColors"> </xref> ，它代表网格线的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.KnownColor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Drawing.KnownColor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性指定的值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified value when setting this property has a <xref:System.Drawing.Color.A%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value that is less that 255.
trans-unit.target: -或-当设置此属性指定的值具有<xref:System.Drawing.Color.A%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值小于 255。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor*>

trans-unit.source: Returns location information, such as row and column indices, given x- and y-coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定 x 和 y 坐标位置信息，如行和列索引。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is located at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法来确定的哪个部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件位于指定坐标处。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call this method—specifying the coordinates of a mouse click—to determine the row and column indexes of the clicked cell or whether a header cell or scroll bar was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以调用此方法-指定的坐标，鼠标单击-若要确定的单击的单元格或确定单击的标题单元格或滚动条的行和列索引。

trans-unit.target: X 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: Y 坐标。
