trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current cell has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前单元格是否有未提交的更改。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is not bound to data, the cell edit is considered committed when the user moves to another cell.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>未绑定到数据，该单元格编辑将被视为用户移到另一个单元格时提交。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If row headers are visible, a pencil glyph is present in the header for the row that contains a cell with uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果行标题是否可见，铅笔标志符号是可行的标头中的包含包含未提交的更改的单元格的行。

trans-unit.source: If IsCurrentCellDirty is `true` and the current cell hosts an editing control, you can retrieve it through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IsCurrentCellDirty`true`和当前单元格承载的编辑控件，可以检索通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell has uncommitted changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前单元格有未提交的更改;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the currently active cell is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否正在编辑当前处于活动状态的单元格。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> that has focus is always in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>获得焦点上始终处于编辑模式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: If the current cell hosts an editing control and IsCurrentCellInEditMode is `true`, you can retrieve the editing control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前单元格承载的编辑控件，并且 IsCurrentCellInEditMode `true`，您可以通过编辑控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell is being edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果正在编辑当前单元格;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current row has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前行是否有未提交的更改。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` when the pencil glyph is displayed in the row.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`true`行中显示的铅笔标志符号时。

trans-unit.source: By default, the IsCurrentRowDirty property will always equal the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> property, unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to a data source that supports editing, or virtual mode has been implemented to use row-level commit scope.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，IsCurrentRowDirty 属性将始终等于的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>属性，除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>绑定到数据源，编辑，支持虚拟模式已实现或使用行级提交范围。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> will evaluate this property at the row level.
trans-unit.target: 在这些情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>将评估行级别的此属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the user navigates away from the row, the control commits all row changes.
trans-unit.target: 当用户导航离开行时，控件将提交所有行更改。

trans-unit.source: The user can also press CTRL+ENTER to commit row changes without leaving the row.
trans-unit.target: 用户还可以按 CTRL + enter 键以提交无需离开行的行更改。

trans-unit.source: To commit row changes programmatically, call the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式提交行更改，请调用窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your data source is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, you can also call<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的数据源是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>，你还可以调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current row has uncommitted changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前行有未提交的更改;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a character is an input character that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 确定字符是否为输入字符<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>识别。

trans-unit.source: A character is recognized as an input character depending on whether the control is in edit mode and whether the current editing control can accept the character.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符被识别为具体取决于控件是否处于编辑模式和当前的编辑控件是否可以接受字符的输入字符。

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character is recognized as an input character; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该字符被识别为输入字符;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的键是常规输入的键还是需要预处理的特殊键。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的键是常规输入的键;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Provides an indexer to get or set the cell located at the intersection of the column and row with the specified indexes.
trans-unit.target: 提供索引器以获取或设置位于列和具有指定索引的行的交叉点处的单元格。

trans-unit.source: This indexer is an alternative to accessing cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 此索引器是访问通过的单元格的替代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>位于指定位置。

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndex小于 0 或大于减 1 的控件中的列数。

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: -或-rowIndex小于 0 或大于减 1 控件中的行数。

trans-unit.source: Provides an indexer to get or set the cell located at the intersection of the row with the specified index and the column with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 提供索引器以获取或设置位于具有指定索引的行和具有指定名称的列的交叉点处的单元格。

trans-unit.source: This indexer is an alternative to accessing cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 此索引器是访问通过的单元格的替代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的列的名称。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>位于指定位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to select more than one cell, row, or column of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> at a time.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许用户选择多个单元格、 行或列<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>一次。

trans-unit.source: When the MultiSelect property is set to `true`, multiple elements (cells, rows, or columns) can be selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 当将多重选择的属性设置为`true`，多个元素 （单元格、 行或列） 中可选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To select multiple elements, the user can hold down the CTRL key while clicking the elements to select.
trans-unit.target: 若要选择多个元素，用户可以按住 CTRL 键同时单击选择的元素。

trans-unit.source: Consecutive elements can be selected by clicking the first element to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last element to select.
trans-unit.target: 通过单击选择的第一个元素，然后在按住 SHIFT 键，单击要选择的最后一个元素，则可以选择连续的元素。

trans-unit.source: The selection scope is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 选择作用域取决于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the user can select multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>，用户可以选择多个列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the MultiSelect property to allow a user to select multiple elements in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control and perform an operation on all the selected elements.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用多重选择属性以允许用户选择多个元素中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制，执行对所有所选元素的操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, the user could select multiple cells and then right-click a selected cell to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks to perform on the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 例如，用户可以选择多个单元格，然后右键单击选定的单元格，以显示显示一组任务以执行上所选单元格的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: To determine which cells, rows, or columns are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, you can access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定中选定的单元格、 行或列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件，你可以访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of selected cells, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellCount%2A> method with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定选定的单元格数，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellCount%2A>具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>的自变量值的方法</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A> method to retrieve the number of selected rows and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A> method to retrieve the number of columns.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>方法来检索所选的行数和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A>方法来检索其中的列数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods are more efficient than accessing the collections directly when working with large amounts of data.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法是比直接访问集合，使用大量的数据时效率更高。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can select more than one cell, row, or column at a time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户可以一次; 选择多个单元格、 行或列否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: 获取新记录行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Unless <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `false`, the value of this property is equal to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>是`false`，此属性的值是否等于减 1 控件中的行数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row for new records, or -1 if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新记录或为-1 如果对应的行的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the user navigates to the new row at the bottom of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>属性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和用户导航到底部的新行<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in virtual mode, this event allows a new entry to be created in the data store for the new row, and it also allows for the row to be populated with default values.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是在虚拟模式下，此事件允许要在新行中，数据存储区中创建的新项，它还允许使用默认值填充的行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that the current cell has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>当前单元格有未提交的更改。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to allow custom cell types to notify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> when they have uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于允许自定义单元格类型，以通知<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>时它们具有未提交的更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the cell has uncommitted changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要指示该单元格有未提交的更改;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnAllowUserToAddRowsChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnAllowUserToAddRowsChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此操作将提交一个单元格值或者进入编辑模式，但数据源中的错误禁止执行操作，这是由于没有处理程序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件，或者处理程序已设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A> property stores the normal value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property and ignores the control's changes.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged> event occurs, and it updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A> property, if necessary, in addition to invoking any event handlers.

trans-unit.source: Binding operations occur when the data changes while a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> is in use.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> event occurs, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> will update its view and raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete> event when it is finished.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>发生事件时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>将更新其视图并引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete>事件完成后。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnEnter method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnEnter 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The control is configured to enter edit mode when it receives focus, but upon entering focus, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 该控件配置为接收焦点，但在输入焦点时进入编辑模式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>当前单元格的属性不指示派生自的类<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>并实现<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: The control is configured to enter edit mode when it receives focus, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 该控件配置为接收焦点，但是没有处理程序的编辑单元格的值失败，并且初始化时进入编辑模式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件，或者处理程序已设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 异常对象通常可以转换为类型<xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: In addition to raising the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged> event, this method uses the new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> property to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objects returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>properties.
trans-unit.target: 除了引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged>事件，此方法使用的新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A>属性更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged>

trans-unit.source: In addition to raising the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged> event, this method uses the new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ForeColor%2A> property to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: This action would cause the control to enter edit mode but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 异常对象通常可以转换为类型<xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that occur during this method are ignored unless they are one of the following: - <xref:System.NullReferenceException> - <xref href="System.StackOverflowException"></xref> - <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> - <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadAbortException"></xref> - <xref href="System.ExecutionEngineException"></xref> - <xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException> - <xref href="System.AccessViolationException"></xref>

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Padding%2A> property is not relevant for this control, although you can change its value and respond to such changes by handling this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Padding%2A>属性不相关对于此控件，但可以更改它的值，还可以通过处理此事件对此类更改做出响应。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Padding%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 绘制背景的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The `clipBounds` parameter represents the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: `clipBounds`参数表示的区域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，需要重新绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user covers the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with another window and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果用户覆盖了整个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>用另一个窗口，然后将其，暴露则`clipBounds`表示整个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If a user covers a small area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the small area that was covered.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户覆盖的较小区域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>然后再将它，然后暴露`clipBounds`表示所涉及的小块区域。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the background.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于绘制背景。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，它表示的区域<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>需要绘制。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area in which cells are drawn.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示绘制单元格的区域。

trans-unit.source: Processes the A key.
trans-unit.target: 处理 A 键。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` when the user presses CTRL+A and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`true`当用户按 CTRL + A 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, this selects all cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此控件中选择所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key or keys to process.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>表示或多个要处理的键的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已处理该键;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes keys used for navigating in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 处理用于在中导航的键<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the key-processing method appropriate to the key pressed (for example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessF2Key%2A> method when F2 is pressed) and returns the return value of that method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用密钥处理方法适合于按下的键 (例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessF2Key%2A>方法时按下 F2) 并返回该方法的返回值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessF2Key%2A>

trans-unit.source: Contains information about the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关已按下的键信息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已处理该键;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The key pressed would cause the control to enter edit mode, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 按下的键将导致控件进入编辑模式，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>当前单元格的属性不指示派生自的类<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>并实现<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此操作将提交一个单元格值或者进入编辑模式，但数据源中的错误禁止执行操作，这是由于没有处理程序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件，或者处理程序已设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: -or- The DELETE key would delete one or more rows, but an error in the data source prevents the deletion and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -或-删除键将删除一个或多个行，但是数据源中的错误禁止删除操作，这是由于没有处理程序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件，或者处理程序已设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes the DELETE key.
trans-unit.target: 处理 DELETE 键。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` when the user presses DELETE to delete rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`true`当用户按 DELETE 键删除控件中的行。

trans-unit.source: The user can delete rows if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以删除行，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to data, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the data source must also be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>绑定到数据，<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的数据源的属性也必须设置为`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key or keys to process.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>表示或多个要处理的键的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已处理该键;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The DELETE key would delete one or more rows, but an error in the data source prevents the deletion and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: DELETE 键将删除一个或多个行，但数据源中的错误阻止删除，并且这是由于没有处理程序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件，或者处理程序已设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes keys, such as the TAB, ESCAPE, ENTER, and ARROW keys, used to control dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 处理键，例如选项卡、 转义，ENTER 和箭头键，用来控制对话框。

trans-unit.source: This method is called in edit mode to handle keyboard input that is not handled by the hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: 在编辑模式下处理未由所承载的编辑控件的键盘输入调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If a key press is determined to not be an input key, it will be sent to the base class for processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果按键确定不会是输入的键，它将发送到处理的基类。

trans-unit.source: The key pressed would cause the control to enter edit mode, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 按下的键将导致控件进入编辑模式，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>当前单元格的属性不指示派生自的类<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>并实现<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can edit the cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以编辑的单元格<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: A cell is read-only if the value of the ReadOnly property is `true` for the cell, the cell's row, the cell's column, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 单元格是只读的 ReadOnly 属性的值是否`true`单元格、 单元格的行，该单元格的列或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user cannot edit the cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户不能编辑的单元格<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件的指针; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the current cell is in edit mode, and the current cell contains changes that cannot be committed.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性指定的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，当前单元格处于编辑模式，并且当前单元格包含无法提交的更改。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property would cause the control to enter edit mode, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性指定的值将导致控件进入编辑模式，但是没有处理程序的编辑单元格的值失败，并且初始化<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件，或者处理程序已设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 异常对象通常可以转换为类型<xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the value of the current cell with the underlying cell value when the cell is in edit mode, discarding any previous value.
trans-unit.target: 单元格处于编辑模式，放弃以前的任何值时，请刷新当前单元格的值与基础单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to force a cell to update its display value in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以强制单元格更新其显示值处于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when an external process modifies the cell value and you want to notify the user of the change, even when a user-specified change is lost as a result.
trans-unit.target: 当外部进程修改单元格的值，而且你想要通知的更改，用户，因此会丢失用户指定的更改的情况下，即使，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successful; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成功，则，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event occurred.

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text*> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 重置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text*>为其默认值的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Although this method behaves as described, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A> property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: 尽管此方法的行为如下所述，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A>属性对于此控件无关。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's shortcut menu is needed.
trans-unit.target: 在需要行的快捷菜单时发生。

trans-unit.source: The RowContextMenuStripNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: RowContextMenuStripNeeded 事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Handling the RowContextMenuStripNeeded event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: 你想要显示由行的当前状态或它包含的值的快捷菜单时，处理 RowContextMenuStripNeeded 事件非常有用。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the RowContextMenuStripNeeded event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在处理 RowContextMenuStripNeeded 事件时，显示指定处理程序中的快捷菜单每当用户右键单击某一行除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>重写被单击的特定单元格的快捷菜单。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The RowContextMenuStripNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row.
trans-unit.target: 每当也会发生 RowContextMenuStripNeeded 事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性检索时，或者以编程方式或当用户右键单击某一行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性以确定它包含的值或行的状态，使用此信息来更改或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用行的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性，该事件值重写属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the RowContextMenuStripNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 处理 RowContextMenuStripNeeded 事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置行的性能损失时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>为多行值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中显示的行数<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If RowCount is set to a value less than the current value, rows will be removed from the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果行计数设置为小于当前值的值，将从末尾删除行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: If RowCount is set to a value greater than the current value, rows will be added to the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果行计数设置为一个值大于当前值，将行添加到的末尾<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The additional rows are based on the row specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 其他行基于中指定的行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the RowCount property to 0, all rows will be removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 如果行计数属性设置为 0 时，将从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>中删除所有行

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 这是等效于调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `true`, you cannot set RowCount to 0.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>是`true`，不能将行计数设置为 0。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to remove all rows except the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来删除除用于新纪录的行之外的所有行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A> has the same result as setting RowCount to 1 in this case, but is much faster.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A>具有相同的结果与在此情况下，将行计数设置为 1，但要快得多。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RowCount property can be used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A> property to create a simple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> for displaying and editing text.
trans-unit.target: 行计数属性可与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>属性创建一个简单<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>用于显示和编辑文本。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the RowCount property to a value greater than 0 for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control without columns, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> is added automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果你行计数将属性设置为一个值大于 0 的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>无列，控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>自动添加。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to display in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要在中显示的行数<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性指定的值小于 0。

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified value is less than 1 and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -或-指定的值是小于 1 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>属性设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*> property for a row changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>行更改的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a row is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a row is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 当任何一个时，将发生此事件的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性行设置为新值，或当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>行的属性设置为一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>而至少一个属性值不同于上一个单元格样式对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> needs to determine whether the current row has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>属性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>需要用来确定当前行是否有未提交的更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: By default, this event sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` if any cells in the current row have been modified.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此事件将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性`true`如果当前行中的任何单元格进行了修改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit> event to occur when the user reverts edits to a row.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit>事件发生时用户将恢复到的行的编辑。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit>

trans-unit.source: Users can revert edits to a row by pressing ESC twice when a cell is in edit mode or once outside of edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以通过按 esc 键两次时单元格处于编辑模式或第一次外部编辑模式恢复对行进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: This event can be used for customizing commit scope in virtual mode by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the correct value depending on the chosen commit scope.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可以用于通过设置自定义提交作用域中的虚拟模式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>为正确的值，具体取决于选定的提交范围的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the divider between two rows.
trans-unit.target: 当用户双击两行间的分隔符时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a row divider.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于自定义当用户双击行分隔符时发生的自动调整大小行为。

trans-unit.source: The row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click.
trans-unit.target: 行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>属性不会扩展用户可在其中双击的区域。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the height of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column.
trans-unit.target: 如果已通过使用此属性增加了分隔符的高度，则当用户双击分隔线和相邻的列之间的边界发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: The divider height is modified by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is initially loaded, as well as when the user selects a row other than the current row.
trans-unit.target: 此事件发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>最初加载时，以及当用户选择当前行以外的行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A> property is updated.
trans-unit.target: 此事件之前发生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A>更新属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's error text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 在需要某一行的错误文本时发生。

trans-unit.source: The RowErrorTextNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: RowErrorTextNeeded 事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件设置或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handling the RowErrorTextNeeded event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: 你想要确定具体取决于其状态以及它包含的值的行的错误时，处理 RowErrorTextNeeded 事件非常有用。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the RowErrorTextNeeded event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 处理 RowErrorTextNeeded 事件处理程序中指定错误文本时，行标题中显示错误标志符号除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 当用户移动鼠标指针放在错误图标上方时，错误文本将显示在工具提示中。

trans-unit.source: The RowErrorTextNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 每当也会发生 RowErrorTextNeeded 事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>检索属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性以确定它包含的值或行的状态，使用此信息来更改或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用行的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>属性，该事件值重写属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the RowErrorTextNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple rows.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column that contains row headers is displayed.

trans-unit.source: If the RowHeadersVisible property is `false`, a row whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Resizable%2A> property is set to `true`can still be resized in the user interface (UI) by clicking the mouse cursor anywhere along the bottom border of the row to be resized.
trans-unit.target: 如果 RowHeadersVisible 属性为`false`，行其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Resizable%2A>属性设置为`true`仍可调整大小在用户界面 (UI) 中通过单击鼠标光标下边框要调整大小的行上的任意位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Resizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the column that contains row headers is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width, in pixels, of the column that contains the row headers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的宽度，以像素为单位，包含行标题的列。

trans-unit.source: The RowHeadersWidth property can be used to resize the row header column to a specified width.
trans-unit.target: RowHeadersWidth 属性可用来调整行标题列到指定的宽度。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the width of this column to fit the contents of the row header cells, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整以适应行标题单元格的内容此列的宽度，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the column that contains row headers.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位，包含行标题的列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The default is 43.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 43。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than the minimum width of 4 pixels or is greater than the maximum width of 32768 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性指定的值小于 4 像素的最小宽度或大于 32768 像素的最大宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the width of the row headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示行标题的宽度以及调整它可以由用户调整还是根据自动调整以适应标题内容。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to an automatic sizing mode, the width of the row headers cannot be adjusted by the user.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为自动调整大小模式时，则无法由用户调整行标题的宽度。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the height of the row headers programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> method or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式调整行标题的高度，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>方法或一组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the sizing mode for the column headers, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置列标题的大小调整模式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 标头大小有关的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件不支持双缓冲。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>设置为`true`中派生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件，用户将不会收到可视反馈，或对列重新排序时调整行、 列或标头的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value indicating the mode by which the width of the row headers can be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref>值，该值指示可以下调整行标题的宽度的模式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>.
