trans-unit.source: Occurs when information about row height is requested.
trans-unit.target: 请求有关行高度的信息时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is useful for preserving custom row heights after a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于在排序操作之后保留自定义行高。

trans-unit.source: This is necessary because sorting operations are normally handled by the data source, which does not keep track of the correspondence between rows of data and rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: 这是必需的因为排序操作通常由数据源，不会不跟踪的数据行和控件中的行的对应关系。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has been set or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性时，或者当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, you provide your own data store and sorting operations.
trans-unit.target: 在后一种情况下，你可以提供你自己的数据存储和排序操作。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed> event to store updated height information when the user changes a row height.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>事件，以存储更新后的高度的信息，当用户更改行高度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>

trans-unit.source: Use RowHeightInfoNeeded to retrieve the stored height information when the control needs it.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RowHeightInfoNeeded 在控件需要它时检索存储的高度信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user changes the height of a row.
trans-unit.target: 当用户更改行高度时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is set to `true` or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set to a value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: 将引发此事件时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性设置为`true`或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>属性设置为值`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is used to track and store row height information so that it can be restored after a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件用于跟踪和存储行高度信息，以便可以在排序操作之后还原它。

trans-unit.source: To restore height information, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要还原高度信息，请处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Note that this event occurs only when the user changes the height of a row.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，仅当用户更改行的高度时，才会发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: If you change the height of a row programmatically, you must store the new height information at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 如果以编程方式更改行的高度，你必须存储在同一时间的新高度信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row loses input focus and is no longer the current row.
trans-unit.target: 行失去输入的焦点因而不再是当前行时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight*> property for a row changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight*>行更改的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> is painted.
trans-unit.target: 之后，将会<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>绘制。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event alone or in combination with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> event to customize the appearance of rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: 单独使用或与结合使用，你可以处理此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>事件自定义控件中的行的外观。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs> class to paint other parts: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A> You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 你可以绘制整个行，你自己，或特定部分的行并使用下列方法之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>类来绘制其他部分:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A>-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A>还可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>类来绘制使用当前主题的标准控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，你可以访问你可以使用的标准映像的大型库<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> is painted
trans-unit.target: 之前发生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>绘制

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event alone or in combination with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> event to customize the appearance of rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: 单独使用或与结合使用，你可以处理此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>事件自定义控件中的行的外观。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs> class to paint other parts: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A> You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 你可以绘制整个行，你自己，或特定部分的行并使用下列方法之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>类来绘制其他部分:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A>-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A>还可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>类来绘制使用当前主题的标准控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，你可以访问你可以使用的标准映像的大型库<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains all the rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含中的所有行的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the Rows collection to manually populate a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control instead of binding it to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用行集合手动填充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件而不是将其绑定到数据源。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to manually add and insert rows.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了如何手动添加并插入新行。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have added four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> instances to the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定你已添加四个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>到控件的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight") Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four") ``` [C#] ``` this.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight");this.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four"); ``` For a detailed example that programmatically populates an unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, see the Example section.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight") Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four") ``` [C#]``` this.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight");this.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four"); ```有关以编程方式填充未绑定的详细示例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件，请参见示例部分。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Rows include style information in addition to cell values.
trans-unit.target: 行中包含样式信息以及单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, you might want to add or insert rows based on existing rows that you have already styled.
trans-unit.target: 为此，你可能想要添加或插入基于你已经设置样式的现有行的行。

trans-unit.source: You can do this using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopy%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopies%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopy%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopies%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以执行此使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopy%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopies%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopy%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopies%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopies%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopy%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopies%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopy%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Rows collection to modify the values in the control or to remove rows.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改控件中的值，或以删除的行，您也可以使用行集合。

trans-unit.source: You can modify values or remove rows regardless of whether the control is bound to an external data source.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改值或删除行而不考虑是否将控件绑定到外部数据源。

trans-unit.source: If there is a data source, the changes are made directly to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有数据源，所做的更改进行直接到数据源。

trans-unit.source: You may still need to push the data source updates to a remote database, however.
trans-unit.target: 你可能仍需要将数据源更新推送到远程数据库，但是。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 将数据绑定到 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to modify cell values programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式修改单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` ' Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. Me.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value" ' The previous line is equivalent to the following line. Me.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value" ``` [C#] ``` // Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. this.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value"; // The previous line is equivalent to the following line. this.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value"; ``` In addition to the standard collection capabilities, you can use the Rows collection to retrieve information about rows.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` ' Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. Me.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value" ' The previous line is equivalent to the following line. Me.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value" ``` [C#]``` // Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. this.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value"; // The previous line is equivalent to the following line. this.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value"; ```除的标准收集功能，你可以使用行集合来检索有关行的信息。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowState%2A> method to determine the state of a particular row.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowState%2A>方法来确定特定行的状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowsHeight%2A> methods to determine the number of rows or the combined height of rows in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowsHeight%2A>方法，以确定的行数或某一特定状态中的行的高度加总。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowsHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the index of a row with a particular state, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetFirstRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetLastRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetNextRow%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetPreviousRow%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索具有特定状态的行的索引，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetFirstRow%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetLastRow%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetNextRow%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetPreviousRow%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetPreviousRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetNextRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetLastRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetFirstRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to retrieve the index of the first selected row, and then use it to programmatically delete the row.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了如何检索第一个所选行的索引，然后使用它以编程方式删除该行。

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim rowToDelete As Int32 = Me.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( _ DataGridViewElementStates.Selected) If rowToDelete > -1 Then Me.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete) End If ``` [C#] ``` Int32 rowToDelete = this.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( DataGridViewElementStates.Selected); if (rowToDelete > -1) { this.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete); } ``` To improve performance, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> returned by the Rows property can include shared and unshared rows.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim rowToDelete As Int32 = Me.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( _ DataGridViewElementStates.Selected) If rowToDelete > -1 Then Me.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete) End If ``` [C#]``` Int32 rowToDelete = this.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( DataGridViewElementStates.Selected); if (rowToDelete > -1) { this.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete); } ```以提高性能，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>返回行属性可以包括共享和取消共享行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set.
trans-unit.target: 共享的行共享内存以减少大型的记录集的成本。

trans-unit.source: If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible when accessing the Rows property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的记录集非常大，你应小心地保证共享行尽可能多地访问行属性时。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"></xref> that contains all the rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"> </xref>包含中的所有行<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a new row is added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新行添加到后发生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: 添加新行时，控件中的行未自动排序。

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method in a RowsAdded event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要对新的行进行排序为正确的位置，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>RowsAdded 事件处理程序中的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user adds a new row using the row for new records, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value in the handler for this event is equal to the index of the new location of the row for new records, which is one greater than the row just added.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将添加新行，对于新记录，请使用行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>处理程序中的此事件等同于新记录，这是一个大于刚刚添加的行的行的新位置的索引值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you add rows programmatically, however, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> value is the index of the first row added.
trans-unit.target: 添加新行时以编程方式，但是，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>值是添加的第一行的索引。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, this event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event and can be used to create new records in your data store that you can then populate in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 在虚拟模式下，此事件发生之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件，可以用于在数据存储区，然后，您可以填充在中创建新记录<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default style applied to the row cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用于的行单元格的默认样式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将显示其使用指示的单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>属性，它继承类型<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>的其他属性中的样式</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>的样式的单元格</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For cells in all rows, excluding header cells, the styles specified through the RowsDefaultCellStyle property override the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties, and are overridden by the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 对于不包括标题单元格的所有行中的单元格通过 RowsDefaultCellStyle 属性指定的样式重写通过指定的样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，并通过指定的样式会重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: 获取此属性时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>如果未访问属性，则将创建具有默认值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: 获取此属性为多个行时，这可能导致性能造成负面影响。

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 只要有可能，使用单个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>设置此属性对于多个行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to apply to the row cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>将应用于的行单元格<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 此事件发生时的一个属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>属性设置为新值时，或者当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>属性设置为一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>而至少一个属性值不同于上一个单元格样式对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row or rows are deleted from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 从删除一行或多行时发生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When rows are deleted from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, the index numbers of subsequent rows are lowered to compensate.
trans-unit.target: 从删除行时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件，后面的行的索引号将被降低，补偿。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row changes state, such as losing or gaining input focus.
trans-unit.target: 当行更改状态，例如失去或获得输入的焦点时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the row that represents the template for all the rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一行，该行表示控件中的所有行的模板。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you want greater control over the appearance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> rows than what is provided by the various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: 有时你希望更好地控制的外观<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>行少于所提供的各种内容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>单元格样式属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The RowTemplate property lets you create and initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> for use as a template by all rows, including the row for new records if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: RowTemplate 属性，允许您创建和初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>以用作模板的所有行，包括用于新纪录的行 （如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you are setting default values for properties such as row height.
trans-unit.target: 在设置属性，例如行高度的默认值时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: For example, you may want to increase the default row height in order to provide extra room beneath ordinary cell content for displaying content that spans multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能想要增加以便显示跨多个列的内容提供额外的空间下普通单元格内容的默认行高度。

trans-unit.source: Setting the row template is necessary when external data is displayed using custom types derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 设置行模板时需要使用从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>派生的自定义类型显示外部数据

trans-unit.source: With unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controls, you can programmatically populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection with instances of your custom row type.
trans-unit.target: 对于未绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件，你可以以编程方式填充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>与自定义的行类型的实例的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When displaying external data, however, the rows are generated automatically, but they are based on the row template, which you can set to an instance of your custom row type.
trans-unit.target: 显示外部数据时，但是，行自动生成的但它们基于行模板，可以设置为你自定义的行类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: If this property has not been set the first time you retrieve its value, a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> is created and returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未设置此属性检索其值，第一次新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>创建并返回。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> representing the row template.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>表示行模板。

trans-unit.source: The specified row when setting this property has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView*> property set.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时指定的行具有其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView*>属性集。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's state changes from shared to unshared.
trans-unit.target: 当行的状态从共享更改为非共享行时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event during development and testing to help identify code that causes rows to change from a shared to an unshared state.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在开发和测试期间使用此事件，以帮助识别导致行，将从共享更改为该行取消共享状态的代码。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when scaling the control to display large amounts of data.
trans-unit.target: 在缩放控件来显示大量的数据时，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a row has finished validating.
trans-unit.target: 行完成验证之后发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is analogous to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件是类似于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>

trans-unit.source: Use this event to perform post-processing on a row of values.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件来执行值的行上的后续处理。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row is validating.
trans-unit.target: 行验证时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is analogous to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件是类似于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use this event to perform validation on all the values of a row.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件来对所有行的值执行验证。

trans-unit.source: If the row does not pass validation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果该行未通过验证，设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Canceling this event prevents the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated?displayProperty=fullName> events from occurring, and also prevents the user from leaving the invalid row and prevents the row from being saved to an external data source in data bound mode.
trans-unit.target: 取消此事件可防止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated?displayProperty=fullName>事件的发生，还可防止用户离开无效的行并防止行保存到外部数据源中数据绑定模式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user scrolls through the control contents.
trans-unit.target: 在用户滚动控件内容时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of scroll bars to display for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的滚动条，若要显示有关类型<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of this property, scroll bars are shown only when they are needed.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值，无论它们在需要时才显示滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to prevent scroll bars from appearing.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性以防止出现滚动条。

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when you want to provide an alternative user interface (UI) for scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 这很有用，例如，如果你想要为滚动提供备用用户界面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性不是有效指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property cannot be set because the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is unable to scroll due to a cell change that cannot be committed or canceled.
trans-unit.target: 无法设置此属性的值，因为<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>无法滚动由于的单元格更改无法提交或取消。

trans-unit.source: Selects all the cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 选择中的所有单元格<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in column-selection mode and this method is called, each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `true`, and each row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>为列选择模式，此方法调用时，每个列的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>属性设置为`true`，和每个行的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Conversely, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in row-selection mode and this method is called, each row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `true`, and each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 相反，当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是行选择模式，此方法调用时，每个行的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>属性设置为`true`，而每一列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of cells selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户选定的单元格的集合。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedCells property is always populated regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 无论采用何种始终填充 SelectedCells 属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含在引用它时所选内容的只读快照。

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您留此集合的副本，可能不同于实际后续<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>顺序用户可能已更改所选内容的状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您应不执行操作在集合的副本。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection"></xref> that represents the cells selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection"> </xref>表示用户选定的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of columns selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户选定的列的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> for the SelectedColumns property to be populated with selected columns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性必须设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>要与所选列中填充的选定列属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含在引用它时所选内容的只读快照。

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您留此集合的副本，可能不同于实际后续<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>顺序用户可能已更改所选内容的状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您应不执行操作在集合的副本。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection"></xref> that represents the columns selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection"> </xref>表示用户选定的列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of rows selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户选定的行的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> for the SelectedRows property to be populated with selected rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性必须设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>SelectedRows 属性使用选定的行填充。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含在引用它时所选内容的只读快照。

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您留此集合的副本，可能不同于实际后续<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>顺序用户可能已更改所选内容的状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You should therefore not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您应因此不执行操作在集合的副本。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically select a row, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A>property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式选择某一行，将设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection"></xref> that contains the rows selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含用户选定的行。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current selection changes.
trans-unit.target: 当前所选内容更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs whenever cells are selected or the selection is canceled, whether programmatically or by user action.
trans-unit.target: 选定的单元格或取消所选内容时，是否通过编程方式或用户执行任何操作时，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, this event is useful when you want display the sum of the currently selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此事件非常有用，当你想显示当前选定的单元格的总和时。

trans-unit.source: When you change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property, the SelectionChanged event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 当你更改的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>SelectionChanged 事件之前发生的属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any SelectionChanged event handler accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property at this time will get its previous value.
trans-unit.target: 任何 SelectionChanged 事件处理程序访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>此时属性将获取其以前的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not ToolTips will show when the mouse pointer pauses on a cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当鼠标指针停留在单元格上时将显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is `true` and the mouse pointer is over a cell, the cell displays a ToolTip when one of the following conditions is met: - The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not `null` or the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, and a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值时`true`和鼠标指针位于单元格，该单元格显示工具提示，当满足以下条件之一:-的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>属性不是`null`或值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`，和的处理程序的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>为<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>以外的值的属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property of the cell has a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>单元格的属性具有<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>以外的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>-

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect when there is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event handler because getting the value of the property automatically raises the event and returns the ToolTip text specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置不起作用时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件处理程序因为自动获取属性的值引发事件并返回的工具提示文本指定在事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: - The cell value is truncated in the cell display.
trans-unit.target: 的在单元格显示截断单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, the full value of the truncated cell value is displayed in the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 当单元格的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>属性值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>，截断的单元格的值的完整值显示工具提示中。</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if cell ToolTips are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用了单元格工具提示，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the editing glyph is visible in the row header of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示编辑标志符号正在编辑的单元格的行标题中可见。

trans-unit.source: The row header will display an editing glyph that looks like a pencil when the current cell is in edit mode and the user has made changes to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 行标题将显示类似于铅笔，当前单元格处于编辑模式，并且用户已向单元格进行的更改时编辑标志符号。

trans-unit.source: The editing glyph is colored by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A> property of the row header cell.
trans-unit.target: 编辑标志符号会变色使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>行标题单元格的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The glyph is not rendered if there is not enough space to display it completely.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有足够的空间来完全显示，则不会呈现标志符号。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the row header cell has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property set, the glyph is removed if there is not enough room for both the text and glyph.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果行标题单元格具有其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>移除属性集，标志符号，如果没有为文本和字形足够的空间。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The display of the editing glyph is controlled by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A> property in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 显示编辑标志符号的值由控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A>中的虚拟模式属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is controlled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它由控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: The standard glyph is not publicly exposed.
trans-unit.target: 公开不公开的标准标志符号。

trans-unit.source: To customize the glyph, you can create a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义标志符号，可以创建自定义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the editing glyph is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果编辑标志符号可见;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row headers will display error glyphs for each row that contains a data entry error.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示行标题将显示为包含数据输入错误的每一行的错误标志符号。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property indicates if there is an error in one of the cells in a row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>属性指示是否在行中单元格之一时出错。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> is set to a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty>, then an error glyph (![ErrorProvider icon](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider icon")) is shown in the row header.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>设置一个值为非<xref:System.String.Empty>，然后为错误标志符号 (![ErrorProvider 图标](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider 图标")) 所示的行标题。</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default width of the row header includes enough room to display the error glyph, whether or not the glyph is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 行标题的默认宽度包括足够空间来显示错误标志符号，显示标志符号。

trans-unit.source: If the row header size is adjusted so that there is not enough space to display the glyph completely, the glyph is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果行标题的大小调整，以便没有足够的空间来完全显示标志符号，则不会呈现标志符号。

trans-unit.source: Because row headers can display both text and glyphs, header content is displayed by priority, as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: 因为文本和标志符号，可以显示行标题，按优先级别，如下所示将显示标头内容︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Text displayed in the row header cell.
trans-unit.target: 显示在行标题单元格的文本。

trans-unit.source: The editing glyph.
trans-unit.target: 编辑标志符号。

trans-unit.source: The error glyph.
trans-unit.target: 错误标志符号。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the row width is decreased, the error glyph disappears first, then the standard glyph, then text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果在行的宽度会降低，错误标志符号会消失第一次，然后标准标志符号，则文本。

trans-unit.source: Advanced users can customize the error glyph by developing a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 高级的用户可以自错误标志符号定义通过开发的自定义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> indicates there is an error; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>指示错误; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control using an implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 内容进行排序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制使用的实现<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>接口。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: This method allows advanced customization of the sorting feature of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许高级自定义的排序的功能的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: In order to implement a highly customized sorting operation, you can write an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick> event and call this method with an instance of a class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=fullName> interface as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 为了实现高度自定义排序操作，你可以编写的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick>事件和调用此方法与实现的类的实例<xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=fullName>作为参数的接口。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you will typically set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> to disable automatic sorting and to leave room for a sorting glyph.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，通常将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>禁用自动排序并留出空间的排序标志符号。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When sorting by columns set to programmatic sort mode, you must display the sorting glyph yourself by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 在排序时将设置为编程排序模式的列，您必须显示排序标志符号自己通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method works only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 此方法时才起作用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>未设置属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to an external data source, you must use the sorting operations provided by that data source.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件到外部数据源，您必须使用提供该数据源的排序操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When you provide your own data source by implementing virtual mode, you must also handle the sorting operations yourself.
trans-unit.target: 在您自己的数据源提供通过实现虚拟模式时，你还必须处理的排序操作自己。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method automatically sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法会自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>属性`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: An implementation of <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> that performs the custom sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>执行自定义排序操作。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: comparer is .
trans-unit.target: compareris .

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>. -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <>*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>. -or- <>*> is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control in ascending or descending order based on the contents of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 内容进行排序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>按升序或降序基于指定列的内容的控件。

trans-unit.source: This method sorts the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> by comparing values in the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的内容进行排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>通过比较指定列中的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: By default, the sort operation will use the <xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A> method to compare pairs of cells in the column using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，排序操作将使用<xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A>方法来比较的在列中使用的单元格对<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: For columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> properties are set automatically and the appropriate sorting glyph is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A>属性自动设置，则显示相应的排序标志符号。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>，必须通过自己显示排序标志符号<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can customize the sorting operation used by this method by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自定义排序操作使用此方法通过处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 此事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>未设置属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has been set, this method works for data-bound columns only.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>已设置属性，此方法适用于仅限数据绑定列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound columns have had their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定列中获得了其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性集。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性以返回`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control contains both bound and unbound columns, you must implement virtual mode to maintain the values of the unbound columns when the control is sorted by a bound column.
trans-unit.target: 如果你<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件包含绑定和未绑定列，则必须实现虚拟模式来维护未绑定列的值，当对控件进行排序的绑定的列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can do this by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property to `true` and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以执行此操作通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性`true`和处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the column is editable, you should also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果列是可编辑，则还应处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中实现虚拟模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Sorting by unbound columns when the control is data-bound is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持数据绑定控件时，按未绑定列进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The column by which to sort the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所依据的内容进行排序的列<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified column is not part of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的列不属于此<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: -或- <> </> *1> 设置属性和<> *1> 指定列的属性返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: dataGridViewColumnis .

trans-unit.target: <> </> *1> 属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和<> *1> 指定列的属性返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
